title: (1) (H) Handrails having a minimum height of 0
clause_text: (1) (H) Handrails having a minimum height of 0.90 m. from the canter of the treads shall be provided.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: (1) (H) Handrails having a minimum height of 0.90 m. from the canter of the treads shall be provided.
